attributes.action: ban porn sites  from uk watching pornography. All around the uk 65% of adults
attributes.additional_details: We are affected by watching porn
attributes.background: Please ban all the porn sites

rejection.details:
We understand you are concerned about access to pornographic websites. However it's not clear whether you want: such sites themselves to be banned; people to banned from viewing pornographic content; or something else.

In any case, accessing certain kinds of pornography is already illegal. You can find out about this here: https://www.cps.gov.uk/legal-guidance/extreme-pornography.

You could have a petition calling for accessing any pornographic online content to be made illegal, if that is something you'd like to see happen.

If you do choose to start a new petition, please ensure you use your full name, as we can't accept petitions started using just a first name.
